definitions.definition: A unit of human speech which often forms words corresponding to one opening of the mouth; a vowel and its surrounding consonants.
The written representation of a given pronounced syllable.
A small part of a sentence or discourse; anything concise or short; a particle.

main_definition: ( linguistics ) A unit of human speech which often forms words corresponding to one opening of the mouth; a vowel and its surrounding consonants.
secondary_definitions: The written representation of a given pronounced syllable.
A small part of a sentence or discourse; anything concise or short; a particle.
